languages.text: "Если вы ищете реликвии, принадлежащие миссии святого Друза, поговорите с Капелланом. После смерти отче он стал кем-то вроде лидера друзианцев на Футфоле. Реликварий под его защитой точно не разграбят — уж больно он суров".

"If you're looking for the relics of the Saint Drusus mission, talk to Chaplain. After the reverend's death, he became the Drusian leader of sorts here on Footfall. The reliquary will surely be safe under his watch — the man is as hard as plasteel."
languages.original_text: "Если вы ищете реликвии, принадлежащие миссии святого Друза, поговорите с Капелланом. После смерти отче он стал кем-то вроде лидера друзианцев на Футфоле. Реликварий под его защитой точно не разграбят — уж больно он суров".

traits.locale_text: "If you're looking for the relics of the Saint Drusus mission, talk to Chaplain. After Reverend's death, he became the Drusian leader of sorts here on Footfall. The reliquary will surely be safe under his watch — the man is as hard as plasteel."

"If you're looking for the relics of the Saint Drusus mission, talk to Chaplain. After Reverend's death, he became the Drusian leader of sorts here on Footfall. The reliquary will surely be safe under his watch — the man is as hard as plasteel."

"If you're looking for the relics of the Saint Drusus mission, talk to the Chaplain. After Reverend's death, he became the Drusian leader of sorts here on Footfall. The reliquary will surely be safe under his watch — the man is as hard as plasteel."

"If you're looking for the relics of the Saint Drusus mission, talk to Chaplain. After the Reverend's death, he became the Drusian leader of sorts here on Footfall. The reliquary will surely be safe under his watch — the man is as hard as plasteel."

"If you're looking for the relics of the Saint Drusus mission, talk to Chaplain. After the reverend's death, he became the Drusian leader of sorts here on Footfall. The reliquary will surely be safe under his watch — the man is as hard as plasteel."

languages.text: 「聖ドルスス聖務団の遺宝をお探しなら、教戒官と話してみては。司祭の死後は、彼がフットフォールのドルシアンの指導者のような立場になっているの。遺宝も彼の監察下なら安全でしょう―プラスチール並みの堅物だから」
languages.original_text: "If you're looking for the relics of the Saint Drusus mission, talk to Chaplain. After the reverend's death, he became the Drusian leader of sorts here on Footfall. The reliquary will surely be safe under his watch — the man is as hard as plasteel."

traits.locale_text: 「聖ドルスス聖務団の遺宝をお探しなら、教戒官と話してみては。司祭の死後は、彼がフットフォールのドルシアンの指導者のような立場になっているの。遺宝も彼の監察下なら安全でしょう―プラスチール並みの堅物だから」

languages.text: « Si vous cherchez les reliques de la mission drusienne, adressez-vous à Chapelain. Après la mort du révérend, il a plus ou moins pris la tête du groupe à Castel. Le reliquaire ne court aucun risque sous sa protection, cet homme est pour ainsi dire fait en plastacier. »
languages.original_text: "If you're looking for the relics of the Saint Drusus mission, talk to Chaplain. After the reverend's death, he became the Drusian leader of sorts here on Footfall. The reliquary will surely be safe under his watch — the man is as hard as plasteel."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous cherchez les reliques de la mission drusienne, adressez-vous à Chapelain. Après la mort du révérend, il a plus ou moins pris la tête du groupe à Castel. Le reliquaire ne court aucun risque sous sa protection, cet homme est pour ainsi dire fait en plastacier. »

languages.text: “如果你打算找圣德鲁苏斯布道所的圣物的话，和牧师这个人谈谈吧。希罗尼穆斯死了之后，他就成了德鲁苏斯教派在落脚港的新领袖。在他的看管下，那些圣物肯定很安全，这个人就像塑钢一样刚硬。”
languages.original_text: "If you're looking for the relics of the Saint Drusus mission, talk to Chaplain. After the reverend's death, he became the Drusian leader of sorts here on Footfall. The reliquary will surely be safe under his watch — the man is as hard as plasteel."

traits.locale_text: “如果你打算找圣德鲁苏斯布道所的圣物的话，和牧师这个人谈谈吧。希罗尼穆斯死了之后，他就成了德鲁苏斯教派在落脚港的新领袖。在他的看管下，那些圣物肯定很安全，这个人就像塑钢一样刚硬。”

languages.text: "Falls Ihr nach den Relikten der Mission des Hl. Drusus sucht, sprecht mit Ordenspriester. Er ist seit dem Tod des Reverends so etwas wie der Anführer der Drusianer hier auf Footfall. Er passt bestimmt gut auf die Reliquie auf – der Mann ist hart wie Plaststahl."
languages.original_text: "If you're looking for the relics of the Saint Drusus mission, talk to Chaplain. After the reverend's death, he became the Drusian leader of sorts here on Footfall. The reliquary will surely be safe under his watch — the man is as hard as plasteel."

traits.locale_text: "Falls Ihr nach den Relikten der Mission des Hl. Drusus sucht, sprecht mit Ordenspriester. Er ist seit dem Tod des Reverends so etwas wie der Anführer der Drusianer hier auf Footfall. Er passt bestimmt gut auf die Reliquie auf – der Mann ist hart wie Plaststahl."

languages.text: «Si busca las reliquias de la misión de San Drusus, hable con el capellán. Después de la muerte del reverendo, ahora él es el líder drusiano de Paso, por así decirlo. Ese hombre es más duro que el plastiacero, así que el relicario está seguro bajo su protección».
languages.original_text: "If you're looking for the relics of the Saint Drusus mission, talk to Chaplain. After the reverend's death, he became the Drusian leader of sorts here on Footfall. The reliquary will surely be safe under his watch — the man is as hard as plasteel."

traits.locale_text: «Si busca las reliquias de la misión de San Drusus, hable con el capellán. Después de la muerte del reverendo, ahora él es el líder drusiano de Paso, por así decirlo. Ese hombre es más duro que el plastiacero, así que el relicario está seguro bajo su protección».

languages.text: "Aziz Drusus misyonuna ait yadigârları arıyorsanız Vaiz'le konuşun. Muhteremin vefatının ardından Binliman'daki Drususçuların başı o oldu denebilir. Onun sorumluluğunda kutsal emanet odası muhakkak güvende olacaktır. Plasçelik kadar sağlam bir adam."
languages.original_text: "If you're looking for the relics of the Saint Drusus mission, talk to Chaplain. After the reverend's death, he became the Drusian leader of sorts here on Footfall. The reliquary will surely be safe under his watch — the man is as hard as plasteel."

traits.locale_text: "Aziz Drusus misyonuna ait yadigârları arıyorsanız, Vaiz'le konuşun. Muhterem'in ölümünün ardından Binliman'daki Drususçuların başı o oldu sayılır. Onun sorumluluğunda kutsal emanet odası muhakkak güvende olacaktır... Adam resmen plasçelik gibi sert."
